resources.string:
"The update process will take about 3-5 minutes and require 15% or more battery life.
Please make sure remaining battery life is more than 15% before updating.
Do you want to update your Modem Firmware now?"

"DO NOT shut down the device during updating.
An unexpected interruption will cause irreversible damage.
Do you want to update your Modem Firmware now?"

"The process will require 15% or more Battery life.
Please make sure the remaining battery life is more than 15% before starting to update."
